definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: The Jiegou coalmine is situated at southern Huaibei coalfield, designed capacity is 0.
sentences.chinese: 界沟煤矿位于淮北煤田南部，设计生产能力为0。

sentences.english: We have 800-ton heat treatment capability per month.
sentences.chinese: 生产手段齐全能量大，生产能力每月可达800吨。

sentences.english: In order to content the productive capacity of soda, a new calciner system was added.
sentences.chinese: 为满足纯碱生产能力，新增一套煅烧炉系统。

sentences.english: The company's advanced cold-chain logistics system will support the expanding capacity.
sentences.chinese: 该公司先进的冷链物流系统将支持扩大生产能力。

sentences.english: Our company specializes in the R&D and manufacturing of lighting products.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一所拥有开发与生产能力的外销灯具厂。

sentences.english: Malfunctions constitute the major factors affecting the productivity of automatic reeling machines.
sentences.chinese: 丝故障是影响自动缫生产能力的主要因素。

sentences.english: A high level of steel casting production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 高水平的铸钢件生产能力。

sentences.english: Factory annual production capacity of 300000 pieces.
sentences.chinese: 本厂年生产能力达30万件。

sentences.english: The United States economy, at one time, was based on heavy industries and raw production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 美国经济在那时也主要基于重工业和粗放生产能力。

sentences.english: At present, the productivity and gross of Chinese silk industry have been the first place in the world.
sentences.chinese: 目前，中国丝绸业在生产能力和总量上均居世界第一。

sentences.english: The St. Clair Ethanol Plant has a current production capacity of 200 million litres per year.
sentences.chinese: 圣克莱尔乙醇厂目前的生产能力是年产20万吨。

sentences.english: The buyer enquired of the seller about the capacity of the factory .
sentences.chinese: 买方向卖方询问这家工厂的生产能力。

sentences.english: We launched the program of increasing the productivity of 50 billion catties newly.
sentences.chinese: 启动实施全国新增千亿斤粮食生产能力建设规划。

sentences.english: As a result of iron and steel enterprise's rapid development, the productivity of factories greatly enhances.
sentences.chinese: 由于钢铁企业的迅速发展，各厂的生产能力大大提高。

sentences.english: Capacity-Constrained Firm (CCF) and bottlenecks are defined.
sentences.chinese: 定义了生产能力制约型企业。

sentences.english: Sixty-one percent said they will expand overseas production.
sentences.chinese: 61%的企业表示，他们会扩展海外工厂的生产能力。

definition: to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to put into production/to put into operation
